FileFormat.FormatDescription: Stata is a research data analysis and statistical software package. The DTA format contains the Stata dataset. Please contact the PRONOM team if you can provide further information about this format.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

InternalSignature.SignatureNote:
This signature is based on observation from a range of samples and inference from a later specification. This signature could be improved with a better understanding of the formal specification.
'n' 0x(01|02)=(big|little) endianness filetype (0x01) 0x00 at position 109
